EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Case Contact that a comment has been updated to the ticket
EmailTemplate.name: Case Comment has been made by Support
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} has been updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
The support agent assigned to your issue related to case # {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject: {!Case.Subject} has posted a comment for your review.
Comment: {!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
Please click on the Customer Portal tab inside MotoSnap to review all the details regarding this issue.
Your VinCare Support Team
